params.amount: Amount of tokens to deposit (For max: `uint256(-1)`)
params.durationWeeks: Duration in weeks tokens will be locked (4-208)
params.setId: ID stores the amount of tokens deposited.
params.token: Token deposited : DAI, USDC, USDT, 3CRV, uAD or uAD3CRV-f
